Redirect Blocker

Thanks for installing the extension!

If you face any issues, please report them on the Github page with helpful information.

If you have a feature request / suggestion, please report them on the Github page.

Information before use!

- Redirect Blocker main purpose is to stop those harmful or annoying new tab redirects mostly seen on them shadey sites.
As well can block same-tab redirects through links.

- It won’t block necessary redirects, like when a site automatically takes you to a local version (e.g., from bbc.co.uk to bbc.com). It also won’t interfere with normal page navigation.

- BUT THIS MAY BE ADDED IN THE FUTURE!
